mainText.attr1: Nav objects are a quick and easy way to focus on a particular point in 3D space. You can have up to 10 nav objects.
First create a nav object (see key binding above).
To quickly focus on the nav object - double tap its selection key (see above).
The first created nav object is nav object 1, then 2, etc etc.
If over 10 are created - then the oldest gets over-written with the new position.
Position nav objects just like you would position station place holders (left click on them and drag).
To remove a nav object - click on it - then click remove.
You can issue go to orders to nav objects.
First select one or more ships - then right click on the nav object.
Ships will go to the nav object.
When I added these - I thought I'd be using them left and right - I almost never use them.
